description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.de: An der Mikado Highschool werden die besten Studenten zu den aller besten Leibwächtern ausgebildet. Morito Hayama, ein angehender Leibwächter ohne Rang, bekommt plötzlich eine Person zugewiesen, die so wichtig ist, dass bisher kein Leibwächter, der sie beschützen sollte, überlebt hat. Wird Morito dieser Herausforderung gewachsen sein?
description.en: Mikado High School trains the best students to be the best mercenary bodyguards. But Morito Hayama, a merc escort student with no rank whatsoever, is suddenly assigned to guard a person so highly valued that no escort has ever survived before. Will his subject survive the experience? Will he survive?!

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวผมแดงกับจอมเวทอสูร

description.en:
With her mother dead and father long gone, Chise Hatori has spent her childhood being passed unwanted from relative to relative, 
until she finally makes her unfortunate way to a strange and improbable auction block.

Offered as a “Slay Vega” to the highest bidder, Chise is purchased by the (literally) boneheaded Elias Ainsworth, 
who promises to take her on as his apprentice.

Elias is a mage, and his world is one of dragons and faeries - but before Chise can begin to get accustomed to all of this, 
Elias drops another bombshell. Apparently Chise isn't just intended to be his apprentice - she will also be his bride.
description.es: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.ja: 少女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使い――……。羽鳥チセ15歳。身寄りもなく、生きる希望も術も持たぬ彼女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使いだった……。
description.es-la: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.pt-br:
Hatori Chise tem apenas 16 anos, mas ela já perdeu muito mais do que o esperado. Sem uma família nem esperança, parece que todas as portas estão fechadas para ela. Mas um encontro acidental começou a mover as rodas enferrujadas do destino. 

Na sua hora mais escura, um misterioso mago aparece diante de Chise, oferecendo uma chance que ela não poderia recusar. 

Esse mago, que parece mais um demônio do que um humano, irá ele trazer a ela a luz que desesperadamente busca, ou afogá-la em sombras ainda mais profundas?

altTitles.ja: 青春プロタゴニスト 僕たちは恋愛過剰

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Protagonist: Boku-tachi wa Ren'ai Kajou

description.en:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
description.pt-br:
“Cada pessoa é protagonista de sua própria vida. Mas quantos de nós podem viver verdadeiramente? Quantos de nós podem ser verdadeiramente o herói de nossas próprias vidas?” Protagonista Juvenil.

Esta é uma história de amor sobre um estudante do ensino médio que acredita ser incapaz de amar por uma razão ou outra, e uma colega de classe que se apaixona por ele.

altTitles.es-la: El Camino a Casa Después de la Escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja-ro: 可愛くないね、後輩くん

description.en:
"You're really not cute!!!"  
  
Akutsu is still only an underclassman but he's got all the girls' attention. Plus, not only is he good in his studies, he's also the ace of the baseball club.  
  
Even though Ida doesn't want have anything to do with Akutsu but somehow they're often together…?  
  
Don't tell me he actually likes me!?

title.en: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...

altTitles.en: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags...

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった...

altTitles.de: My Next Life as a Villainess: Wie überlebe ich in einem Dating-Game?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生成女性向遊戲只有毀滅END的壞人大小姐

altTitles.zh: 转生成为了只有乙女游戏破灭Flag的邪恶大小姐

description.en: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!

description.pt-br: Como a última das feras divinas que protegiam a terra, Lionel Milliard era cobiçado pelas mulheres por seu poder e influência. Mas depois que um acidente com uma relíquia antiga o liga a uma funcionária de uma pousada chamada Hanna, ele finalmente encontra uma mulher que não tem interesse nele! Lionel, intrigado com a rejeição de Hanna, a convence a embarcar em uma jornada com ele para libertá-los do poder da relíquia. Hanna concorda relutantemente, mas será ela capaz de se defender dos avanços de Lionel ou esta fera devorará mais uma mulher?

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower," a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons.
A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.

Tale of sword & sorcery and labyrinth exploration begins!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

description.en: Senagaki Isaku will be a first year high school student starting in spring. Her grandfather is the third head of the Senagaki group, a yakuza organization, so she is feared by those around her. However, starting from spring, she hopes to make normal friends and normally fall in love. She is admitted into a high school further from her hometown, however, the overprotective young head of the Senagaki group, Utou Keiya, (26 years old) falsifies his age and enters the school with her through a backdoor admission…?! Keiya proclaims that love is too early for her although Isaku is perfectly ready. In truth, she has held an unrequited love for Keiya for quite some time.
description.pt-br: Senagaki Isaku, é uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio e neta do chefe da família Senagaki, um grupo de Yakuzas. Por isso, sempre teve medo de tudo ao seu redor, mas a partir de agora quer poder ter amigos e se apaixonar por pessoas normais. Para isso, Isaku-Chan decide ir estudar em uma escola longe de sua cidade, sem contar que o super protetor Utou Keiya (jovem de 26 anos, integrante do grupo gangster) não tem intenção de deixar nenhum menino se aproximar e vai atrás dela, entrando na mesma escola mentindo sobre sua idade. E assim a história de amor começa!

description.en:
Mitsuki had always dream of breaking out of her shell and finding true friends as she enters high school. However, she suddenly encounters a group of four good-looking guys from the basketball team, guiding her life into an unexpected direction…?  
  
**Note:** Vol. 14 contains 2 "half-time collection" chapters and 3 "extra period" chapters. The last chapter (56) is in 13th volume in original Japanese edition. If your last chapter's vol number cannot match, you cannot get "end" tag next to chapter on MD. Please stop changing the info and confusing the readers.

altTitles.en: Collecting Offerings to the Fox God

title.en: Maseki Gurume: Mamono no Chikara wo Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!

altTitles.en: Magic Stone Gourmet: Eating Magical Power Made Me The Strongest

altTitles.ru: Поедая магические камни, я становлюсь сильнее!

altTitles.ja: 魔石グルメ　魔物の力を食べたオレは最強！

altTitles.ja-ro: Maseki Gurume: Mamono no Chikara o Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!

description.en: In this world, It's only me who can get stronger by eating Magic Stones! At one point, I received an offer to have a smooth life reincarnation from the Goddess-sama… But the skill I got as a prize is Toxins Decomposition EX. Ugh, what a plain skill! It's so pitiful that even my own family makes fun of me… However, one day I realized that because of the effect of this skill, I can eat and gain power from Magic Stones! I've also been notified that I'm the prince from a neighboring country!? What awaits me in the castle are days of experimenting with Magic Stones and training, the perfect environment for me to become the strongest man there is… And to top it off, I received the Magic Stone of Dullahan! The story of a boy on the path to becoming a King while being chased by an assertive fiancee and Female Knights starts here!

"The Maiden in Love Setting Off"

An original comic of the super-large science fiction project "Synduality Noir".

Ellie has feelings for her childhood friend, Kanata. Standing in Ellie's way are various women and magus surrounding Kanata... An original spin-off where you can fully experience her fluctuating emotions!

altTitles.en: How clumsy you are, Miss Ueno

description.en:
Ueno-san is strong in attitude, but weak in romance.  
It's a clumsy-heroine gag comedy!
description.pt-br: Ueno-san tem uma atitude forte, mas é fraca para romances. É uma comédia com uma garota desajeitada!

description.fr: Yonggi a en réalité peur des femmes ?! Yonggi, beau et populaire comme jamais, semble avoir tout. Mais l'apparence peut décevoir, et il joue définitivement la carte de l'escroquerie à long terme. Il n'est pas le Casanova que tout le monde pense ! Un jour, son ancienne camarade de classe, Suyeon, arrive sur son lieu de travail. Sera-t-elle celle qui apaisera enfin son cœur inquiet ?

altTitles.th: ท่านพ่อไร้เทียมทาน

description.en:
Noh Ga Jang has led the life of a warrior ever since he remembers, isolated from the world and illiterate to top it all, until he meets a beautiful woman who steals his heart. He marries her and they live a life of bliss, and she gets pregnant with his children. Against all odds, she unexpectedly dies during childbirth, leaving Noh alone with their newborn triplets. Desperate, saddened, but not broken, Noh swears to the heavens that he'll become an exemplary man to raise the invaluable treasures his wife left him.  
  
Watch the mighty warrior Noh become a Peerless Dad, and slowly realize in the way just how powerful he is for the sake of his children.

孤児としてたらい回しにされていたところ、運良く師匠に拾われ武士としての道を見つけた。 特級解決師として名をはせた「天草家長」は運命の女性に出会い、その名の通り家長となる。 しかし、喜びもつかの間、一夜のうちに血のつながった三つ子を置いて妻に先立たれてしまう。 シングルファーザーとなってしまった「家長」の生活が今始まるーー！

description.ko:
하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

* 원작소설 <지천명아비무쌍>

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

description.ru:
История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.th: เทพเกรียน โรงเรียนมัธยม

altTitles.ja: ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

altTitles.zh: 同一屋檐下，阿斯伯格的她

description.en:
Yokoi Taku has trouble getting along with people, so he moved to Tokyo as soon as he graduated from high school. 
He now lives alone, making a living by delivering newspapers and drawing doujinshi, though people totally ignore his non-erotic works. 
One day, a girl named Saitou Megumi suddenly shows up at his door, claiming that she came all the way from Tottori 
to meet him because she's a big fan of one of his original works. It turns out that she has faced many hardships herself, 
and with no intention of leaving she ends up living with him.  

---
Chinese translation follows online raw chapter numbering starting from chapter 27  
English translation follows tankoubon raw chapter numbering

Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?
When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

title.en: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement

altTitles.fr: Économiser 80,000 pièces d'or dans un autre monde pour ma retraite

altTitles.ja-ro: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu

altTitles.ru: Сохранение 80 000 золотых монет в другом мире для моей старости

altTitles.zh: 为了养老金，去异界存八万金！

altTitles.zh-hk: 為了養老金，去異界存八萬金！

altTitles.ja: 老後に備えて異世界で８万枚の金貨を貯めます

altTitles.es: Ahorre 80 000 monedas de oro en otro mundo en preparación para mi jubilación

altTitles.ko: 노후를 대비해 이세계에서 금화 8만 개를 모읍니다

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she’s always dreamed of! [Kodansha]
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

title.en: Crows ZERO II - Suzuran x Housen

description.en: Crows ZERO II is the follow-up to the manga adaptation of the first Crows ZERO movie. Crows ZERO II covers the events of the second movie, and will see protagonist Takiya Genji taking on Narumi Taiga and the rest of Housen Academy. (Comes out monthly)

title.en: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo, Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in Another World, But For Some Reason No One Wants to Leave.

altTitles.ja: 異世界で孤児院を開いたけど、なぜか誰一人巣立とうとしない件

altTitles.ru: Как открыть приют в другом мире!

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 고아원을 열었지만, 어째서인지 아무도 독립하려 하지 않는다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开了孤儿院，但不知为何没有一个人想离开

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Kojiin wo hiraitakedo nazeka darehitori sudatou to shinaiken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in a Different World, But Why Doesn't Anyone Want to Graduate?

description.en: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?
description.id: Masatsugu dibawa ke dunia lain dalam panggilan pahlawan dan akhirnya menjadi bagian dari kasta terendah. anak ini, yang tidak memiliki apa-apa selain keterampilan dasar, disuruh mengelola panti asuhan penuh gadis-gadis cantik! Tapi, hari-hari menyebalkan nya baru saja di mulai ketika ia menemukan bangunan di reruntuhan, dan ia juga harus membayar utang besar mantan direktur! Dan tidak itu saja, dia tidak punya waktu untuk beristirahat dari semua sampah mengancam panti asuhan! Apakah Masatsugu dan para anak yatim bisa melindungi rumah mereka yang berharga?

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en: The "Couples Game" is played between a man and a woman who love each other. It is a competition in which couples compete to complete a set of instructions. The stage is an abandoned amusement park. The winning couple will receive a prize of 100 million yen and eternal love. The tragic game begins with the words, "Say you love me."

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

description.en: Doujinshi Chinese from the Asgard saga from the anime Saint Seiya.

altTitles.vi: Cơn sốt vàng sau chiến tranh

description.de:
Die Jagd nach dem Ainu-Gold hat begonnen…

Wir schreiben das frühe 20. Jahrhundert, kurz nach dem russisch-japanischen Krieg. Hoch im verschneiten Norden Japans schlägt sich ein einzelner Mann durch die Wildnis. Sein Name: Sugimoto, der Unsterbliche. Geplagt von den Erinnerungen an den Krieg versucht er, sein mageres Einkommen durch Goldschürferei aufzubessern – ohne Erfolg.

Aber dann erfährt er von einem riesigen Goldschatz, der einst den Ainu gestohlen wurde. Der einzige Hinweis: eine Schatzkarte, eintätowiert auf die Rücken zahlreicher Gefängnisinsassen, die sich nun auf der Flucht befinden. Gemeinsam mit dem Ainu-Mädchen Asirpa bricht Sugimoto auf die tödlichste Schatzsuche der Geschichte auf. Denn wer dieses Gold jagt, ist bereit, über Leichen zu gehen…

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.en:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
description.es:
Año 37 de la era Meiji. Tras sobrevivir a la guerra Ruso-Japonesa, Sugimoto, apodado “el Inmortal”, se une a la fiebre del oro para ayudar a la viuda de uno de sus amigos caído durante el conflicto. En su búsqueda, alguien le revela que existe un tesoro escondido y que las distintas claves para encontrarlo las llevan tatuadas en sus espaldas peligrosos convictos prófugos. En su camino se topará con Asirpa, quien no solo le salva la vida, sino que además le ayudará a sobrevivir en la dura tundra salvaje. ¡La carrera por hacerse con el tesoro ha comenzado!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.fr:
Saichi Sugimoto est une véritable légende de la guerre russo-japonaise du début du XXe siècle. Surnommé «l'Immortel,» il a survécu aux pires batailles menées dans les régions les plus sauvages qui soient. Mais quand le conflit se termine, il se retrouve seul et sans le sou… C'est alors qu'il apprend l'existence d'un fabuleux trésor de 75 kilos d'or accumulé par les Aïnous, peuple autochtone vivant en harmonie avec la nature. Hélas, le magot a été volé, puis caché par un homme désormais enfermé dans la pire prison d'Hokkaido. Les seuls indices menant au butin sont de mystérieux tatouages inscrits sur la peau de criminels évadés…

Pour Sugimoto, la chasse au trésor est lancée… Cependant, seul, il a peu de chances de s'en sortir. À peine sa quête commence-t-elle qu’il manque de se faire déchiqueter par un ours brun! Il ne doit la vie qu'à l'intervention providentielle d'Ashirpa, jeune indigène liée aux propriétaires légitimes du butin. Ils décident de faire équipe pour affronter les nombreux dangers qui les guettent sur la route de l'or des Aïnous…

Maintes fois primé au Japon, *Golden Kamui* est un formidable mélange d'aventure en milieu hostile et de découverte culturelle, le tout porté par une intrigue aux rebondissements multiples. Laissez-vous entraîner dans cette quête épique à travers les immensités sauvages d'Hokkaido!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.it:
Nel pieno dell’Era Meiji Saichi Sugimoto, ex soldato d’élite sopravvissuto a una delle battaglie più sanguinose della guerra Russo-Giapponese, lasciato l’esercito ha ormai un solo obiettivo: la corsa all’oro. È questa a portarlo in Hokkaido, l’estremo nord del Giappone abitato dal misterioso popolo degli Ainu e dove secondo una leggenda qualcuno ha nascosto una enorme quantità del prezioso metallo giallo… ma Sugimoto non è l’unico a seguire le tracce che portano al tesoro nascosto e per trovarlo dovrà affrontare spietate bande di criminali, l’esercito e il clima proibitivo dell’Hokkaido con l’aiuto di una giovane e decisa Ainu in cerca di vendetta.

---
In Hokkaido, la regione più a nord del Giappone, Sugimoto è sopravvissuto alla guerra russo-giapponese dell'epoca Meiji. Soprannominato durante la guerra "l'invincibile Sugimoto", adesso inizia la sua corsa all'oro alla ricerca delle ricchezze che gli permetteranno di salvare la moglie di un suo commilitone morto durante la guerra. Durante la ricerca s'imbatte in alcuni indizi che lasciano presagire l'esistenza una riserva d'oro gestita da criminali corrotti. Accompagnato da una ragazza Ainu che ha salvato la sua vita messa alla prova dal terribile clima del nord, i due iniziano la loro avventura contro i criminali.

---

description.ja:
『不死身の杉元』日露戦争での鬼神の如き武功から、そう謳われた兵士は、ある目的の為に大金を欲し、かつてゴールドラッシュに沸いた北海道へ足を踏み入れる。そこにはアイヌが隠した莫大な埋蔵金への手掛かりが!?　立ち塞がる圧倒的な大自然と凶悪な死刑囚。そして、アイヌの少女、エゾ狼との出逢い。『黄金を巡る生存競争』開幕ッ!!!!

description.pt:
Após feitos dignos de um guerreiro na Guerra Russo-Japonesa, o soldado conhecido como “Sugimoto, o imortal” vai para Hokkaido, onde houve a corrida do ouro, em busca de uma grande quantia de dinheiro para realizar certo objetivo. Ali, encontra pistas que levam a um grande tesouro escondido pelos ainus, mas ele precisa enfrentar também a natureza selvagem opressiva e prisioneiros violentos, assim como conhece uma garota ainu e um raro lobo-de-hokkaido. Tem início a luta pela sobrevivência em busca do ouro!!!

---

description.ru:
На Хоккайдо, далеко, в северных землях Японии, живёт Сугимото, переживший русско-японскую войну, и прозванный на ней Бессмертный Сугимото. Теперь он ищет богатства, обещанные золотой лихорадкой, в надежде спасти овдовевшую жену своего покойного товарища. Во время своей охоты на золото, он находит намеки на скрытый золотой склад преступников. Вместе с девушкой айну, которая некогда спасла его, они отважились на смертельное приключение против преступников, в поисках золотого тайника.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.tr:
Sugimoto, Meiji Dönemi'nde, Japonya'nın kuzeyindeki Hokkaido'da meydana gelen Rus-Japon Savaşından sağ olarak kurtulur. Savaş boyunca "Ölümsüz Sugimoto" olarak anılan bu adam, şimdilerde savaşta ölen arkadaşının karısını kurtarma ümidi ile altınla gelen vaat edilmiş zenginliğin peşine düşer. Bu altın avcılığı süresince, yozlaşmış suçluların sakladığı altın gömüsüyle alakalı ipuçları bulur. Kötü iklim şartlarında hayatını kurtaran Auni'li bir kızla ortak olarak, altını arayan amansız suçlulara karşı ölüm-kalım mücadelesine girerler.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.uk:
Далеко, на північних землях Хоккайдо, ветеран російсько-японської війни, за прізвиськом Суґімото "Безмертний", вирушив на пошуки багатств, обіцяні золотою лихоманкою. Загиблий товариш благав попіклуватись Сайчі про його хвору дружину, що терміново потребує гроші на лікування. Під час свого чергового невдалого полювання на золото, старий п'яниця розбовтує колишньому солдату про таємничий скарб айну, який викрав та сховав невідомий злодій. Натрапивши на слід "Безсмертний" Суґімото Сайчі розпочинає смертельну гонку з дівчинкою айну, на ім’я Асірпа.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---

description.vi:
Tại Hokkaido, hòn đảo xa miền cực bắc của nhật bản, nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Sugimoto Saichi trở về từ cuộc chiến tranh Nga Nhật thời kì Minh Trị. Với biệt danh "Sugimoto Bất Tử" trong chiến tranh, anh lao vào chạy theo cơn sốt vàng nhằm thực hiện ý nguyện của người bạn thân đã mất trong trận chiến

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.pt-br: Em Hokkaido, nas terras do extremo norte do Japão, Sugimoto sobreviveu à guerra russo-japonesa da era Meiji. Apelidado de "Sugimoto, o Imortal" durante a guerra, ele agora procura as riquezas prometidas pela corrida do ouro, na esperança de salvar a esposa viúva de seu falecido companheiro da guerra. Durante a sua caça ao ouro, ele descobre sobre um estoque enorme de ouro escondido por um criminoso. Através de uma parceria com uma garota da tribo Ainu, que salva a sua vida, ele luta contra os criminosos, os militares, e a própria natureza para encontrar o tesouro!
description.zh-hk:
被稱為『不死身的杉元』、在日俄戰爭中有如鬼神般的殺敵， 被世人如此熟知的杉元佐一， 為了得到大量的黃金，來到了昔日淘金熱潮盛行的北海道。 於某次機遇下，他得知了隱藏著愛奴人龐大財寶的線索!? 在充滿威嚴的大自然中， 和許多兇惡的死刑犯、以及愛奴少女相遇， 『尋找黃金的生存競爭』正式開幕!!!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.

* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

description.en:
“[Class: Hotel Manager (Hidden) awakened!]

Mac x Mo x Gol x Coffee turns into potions,
A mysterious hotel where staying for a day restores stamina.
Awakened as the manager of this place!

All guests are hunters, and the hotel is in the middle of a dungeon.
Just by putting on a business smile, money rolls in, right?!

“Welcome, welcome to the Yeongchun Hotel!”

In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

description.en: The Demon Neuro has a raging hunger for ‘mysteries.’ Being dissatisfied with his current regime in hell, he’s come into the mortal realm in order to satiate his ever-growing appetite. The murder case of a young girl’s father seems to be sufficiently enticing for the Demon’s needs.. But what else might happen between these two? Find out in this disturbingly good murder-mystery series.

The Demon Neuro has a raging hunger for ‘mysteries.’ Being dissatisfied with his current regime in hell, he’s come into the mortal realm in order to satiate his ever-growing appetite. The murder case of a young girl’s father seems to be sufficiently enticing for the Demon’s needs.. But what else might happen between these two? Find out in this disturbingly good murder-mystery series.

title.en: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine

description.en: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.

altTitles.ja: ファンタスマゴリア・デイズ

description.en:
Follow the daily life and adventures of Dr. Hoop and his assistant, the robot Lancelot, across the planet Phantasmagoria in these short stories brimming with all sorts of peculiar characters. Experience the unique warmth and creativity Tamura Shigeru has to offer in this nostalgic world of his creation - infused with a touch of both humor and sadness.

---
More exploration of the world of Phantasmagoria, created after Tamura's short animation featuring scenes from the same world: **a piece of PHANTASMAGORIA**.

title.en: Bing Jiao Shidi You Zai Gen Wo Zhuang Kelian

altTitles.zh: 病娇师弟又在跟我装可怜

altTitles.zh-ro: Bìng Jiāo Shīdì Yòu Zài Gēn Wǒ Zhuāng Kělián

altTitles.en: The Yandere Martial Junior Brother Is Pretending to Be Pitiful to Me

altTitles.es: El Yandere Hermano Menor Pretende Ser Lamentable Conmigo Otra vez

description.en: A graceful lady was reborn as an adorable girl?! Haven't yet rejoiced for her luck to live again, Liu Zhaozhao had already found out her previous pure and good-natured martial junior brother who had been obedient to her has unexpectedly become the arch-villain. What exactly had happened?
description.es: ¿Una elegante dama renació como una niña adorable? Aún no se había regocijado por su suerte de volver a vivir, Liu Zhaozhao ya había descubierto que su anterior hermano menor marcial, puro y bondadoso, que había sido obediente a ella, se había convertido inesperadamente en el archivillano. ¿Qué había pasado exactamente?
description.zh: 御姐重生成萌妹？！ 还没等柳昭昭庆幸自己能重生再来，她就发现，先前对她千依百顺的纯良小师弟，竟然变成了疯批大魔头？ 这到底是怎么回事？

description.en: An era of peace between the hero and demon lord is upon us! In this peaceful world, the hero Corleo is nothing but an empty suit. But one day, a hero and demon lord from another world appear before him! How will Corleo deal with the chaos these invaders bring to his world?! A new type of fantasy epic now begins!

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr: Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. “Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

title.ja-ro: Naze Boku no Sekai wo Daremo Oboeteinai no ka?

altTitles.vi: Phy Sew lu, ele tis Es feo r-delis ec I.

altTitles.en: Why Doesn't Anybody Remember My World?

altTitles.ja: なぜ僕の世界を誰も覚えていないのか？

altTitles.en: Why Does Nobody Remember Me in This World?

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.
